files.patch:
@@ -119,1 +119,4 @@
-            lines.map(line -> line.split(":"))
+            // The limit value of 3 is because /proc/self/cgroup contains three
+            // colon-separated tokens per line. The last token, cgroup path, might
+            // contain a ':'.
+            lines.map(line -> line.split(":", 3))
